statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT user_id, experiment_group FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, experiment_group, conversion_status FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_data
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_data WHERE experiment_group = 'group_A' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT user_id, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_data WHERE experiment_group = 'group_B' ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT user_id, experiment_group FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 AND experiment_group = 'group_A';
SELECT user_id, experiment_group FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_status = FALSE;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT result_id, group_name, conversion_rate, sample_size FROM ab_test_results WHERE conversion_rate < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_test_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, group_name, conversion_rate, sample_size FROM ab_test_campaigns JOIN ab_test_results ON ab_test_campaigns.campaign_id = ab_test_results.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM user_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = true ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT test_id, user_id, campaign_id, variation FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = true ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_group FROM experiment_data WHERE end_date > now();
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date, conversion_rate FROM campaign_data ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date, experiment_group FROM experiment_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.6 ORDER BY experiment_id ASC
SELECT user_id, conversion_status, conversion_amount FROM experiment_results WHERE conversion_amount >= 1000
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_status FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE conversion_status = true;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, sign_up_date FROM A/B_Testing_Data ORDER BY sign_up_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT campaign_id, sign_up_date FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, sign_up_date, conversion_status FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE conversion_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(campaign_id) AS campaign_ids FROM A/B_Testing_Data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN A/B_Testing_Data ON Campaigns.campaign_id = A/B_Testing_Data.campaign_id;
